text: Causes of action for breach of promise, alienation of affections, and criminal conversation are hereby abolished.

DC CODE § 16-923

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Particular Actions, Proceedings and Matters. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Divorce, Annulment, Separation, Support, Etc. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Abolition of action for breach of promise, alienation of affections, and criminal conversation.
